message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. My initial offer is $9,000 for the product. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $9,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now.  I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  Let's see if we can make this work.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer of $8,500. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $9,250 for the product. Let's see if we can find a sweet spot.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $9,250 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $8,750.  This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence and willingness to negotiate. I'm still a bit above my minimum price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering $9,000, which is the same price I initially offered. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle this time.

Alice,  I understand you're still a bit above your minimum.  However, I'm really pushing my budget here.  I'm willing to go up to $8,800.  This is the highest I can go, and I hope we can reach an agreement.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your honesty about your budget. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering $9,100, which is a bit above my initial offer. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle this time.
Alice, I've really stretched my budget here.  $8,800 is the absolute highest I can go.  If you're not willing to accept this offer, I'll have to consider other options.

Hi Bob, I understand you've reached your budget limit, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I'm still not at my minimum price. I'm willing to make one last concession. I'm counteroffering $9,200, which is the lowest I'm willing to go. If this doesn't work, I'll have to consider other options, including selling to another buyer.
